title: It's New Years. Anyone want to skype and play league with me?
body: I had a full party yesterday. It was fun. Anyone down to play today? I'm a crappy diamond 5, 0 lp player who enjoys long walks on the beach. On the serious note I want to play with other people instead of playing by myself tonight. Add me my ign Nativo if you want to play and talk. It would be cool to get a full party.

replies.body: Helloooo my friend and i are wondering if you would join us. We have skype as well. My name is "MrTittyMcSwag". Please join us
